item.title: Senate
item.description: Senate is an infrastructure tool made for governance teams and delegates which aims to help you never forget to vote on a proposal ever again. It does so by giving you access to a dashboard which includes all the new proposals of the DAOs you follow. To increase your visibility as a delegator, it as well allows you to view and share your past votes. Future plans include notifications across a variety of channels, like Discord, Telegram or EPNS.
